title: The Epic Week of Charlie Scott: A Superhero's Journey
summary: Charlie Scott, a 63-year-old who loves coaching, discovers his superpower of empathy, which changes the lives of many in his community over the course of a week.
summaryGerman: Charlie Scott, ein 63-jähriger, der das Coaching liebt, entdeckt seine Superkraft der Empathie, die im Laufe einer Woche das Leben vieler in seiner Gemeinde verändert.
summaryDutch: Charlie Scott, een 63-jarige die van coaching houdt, ontdekt zijn superkracht van empathie, die in de loop van een week het leven van velen in zijn gemeenschap verandert.
summaryFrench: Charlie Scott, âgé de 63 ans et passionné de coaching, découvre son super pouvoir d'empathie, qui change la vie de nombreux membres de sa communauté au fil d'une semaine.

story.text: Charlie discovers he can feel exactly what others feel, making him an incredibly effective coach.
He uses his power to solve a deep-seated conflict between two of his athletes, bringing the team closer.
Charlie feels overwhelmed by the emotional demands of his power, taking a quiet day to reflect and recharge.
He helps an old friend reconnect with a lost love through heartfelt advice, feeling the warmth of romance touch his own heart.
News of his abilities spreads, stirring intrigue and drawing in curious locals, creating an eerie atmosphere.
Inspired by others' faith in him, Charlie organizes a community event that fosters unity and joy, feeling incredibly energetic.
At the week’s end, Charlie quietly reflects on his impacts, feeling at peace with the new balance of his life.

ending: Thus, Charlie Scott embraced his newfound powers not just to coach but to heal, proving true heroism lies in compassion.
moral: The true power of a hero lies in their empathy and ability to bring people together.
